design.validation_notes: Design review completed with GO decision (conditional) - 3 critical issues identified: (1) WASM function signature uncertainty (to be verified in implementation tasks), (2) LINE mini-app environment constraints (marked as not required), (3) Memory management details (marked as not required). Added comprehensive development environment specifications: Node.js Runtime (nodenv + Node.js 24.x Active), Package Manager (pnpm), Development Tools (ESLint + Prettier + TypeScript) following Next.js best practices.
design.critical_issues_resolution: Issue 1 (WASM signatures) will be addressed in implementation tasks. Issues 2 and 3 marked as not required by user.
